English: I don't know what Tom saw.
Chinese: 我不知道汤姆看到了什么。

English: I don't meet him so often.
I don't mind if I get wet.
I feel a lot better today.
I forgot it in the garage.
I found out where she was.
I gave her a lift to town.
I go to bed after I study.
Chinese: 我讀完書之後就去睡覺。

English: I go to bed late at night.
I go to church on Sundays.
I got a new pair of shoes.

Chinese: 我叫人把我的自行车修好了。

English: I got some sand in my eye.
I guess I waited too long.
I had an accident at work.
I have a few friends here.
I have a lot of bad teeth.
I have a surprise for you.
I have no idea who she is.

Chinese: 我现在还没有吃过午饭。

English: I heard Tom could do that.
I hope I can see you soon.
Chinese: 我希望很快就能見到你。

English: I hope I'm not boring you.
I knew I was going to win.
I knew what Tom was doing.
I know Tom is watching me.
I know how to drive a car.
I know that Tom is hungry.
I know that life is short.
I know that you hired Tom.
I like both dogs and cats.
I like this color as well.
I like to travel by train.
I made his son a new suit.
Chinese: 我給他的兒子做了一套新西裝。

English: I may have made a mistake.
I may have made a mistake.
I met him at the barber's.
I met him on his way home.
Chinese: 在他回家的路上我遇見了他。

English: I might not see Tom today.
Chinese: 我今天可能見不到湯姆了。

English: I must have caught a cold.
I need to get some stamps.
I prefer to travel by air.
I promise that I'll do it.
I ran as fast as possible.
I ran as fast as possible.
I really have to be going.
I really need a drink now.
Chinese: 我现在真需要来杯喝的。

English: I saw Tom three hours ago.
Chinese: 我在三小时前见过汤姆。

English: I saw him after ten years.
I saw it in the newspaper.
I saw it in the newspaper.
Chinese: 我是在报纸上看到它的。

English: I saw it with my own eyes.
I saw it with my own eyes.
I saw more than Tom knows.
I see a cat chasing a dog.
Chinese: 我看见一只猫追着一只狗跑。

English: I spoke to Tom last night.
I started to write a book.
I stay at home on Sundays.
I stood waiting for a bus.
I take a bath every night.
I think I have a question.
I think I know who did it.
Chinese: 我認為我知道是誰做的。

English: I think it was a good day.
I think she is very brave.
I think that would be fun.
I think this book is easy.
I think you look like Tom.
I want to be a journalist.
I want to become a singer.
I want to eat out tonight.
I want to play the guitar.
I want to see your mother.
I want to travel with you.
I want you out of my room.
Chinese: 我想讓你離開我的房間。

English: I want you to be prepared.
I want you to sleep on it.
I want you to wait for me.
I want you to work harder.
Chinese: 我希望你更加努力地工作。

English: I was almost hit by a car.
I was barely able to work.
I was just about to leave.
I was scared all the time.
I was trying to kill time.
I was very busy last week.
I will give you this book.
I will see them next week.
I wish you had been there.
I work for an oil company.
Chinese: 我為一家石油公司工作。
我和她的男朋友在一起上班。

English: I'd like a glass of water.
I'd like to come with you.
I'd love to come with you.
I'd never let you kiss me.
Chinese: 我永远也不会让您亲我。

English: I'll be there in a minute.

Chinese: 我會借給你我的筆記本。

English: I'll meet to you at eight.
I'll miss you all so much.

Chinese: 我天生是一個樂觀主義者。

English: I'm glad I could help out.
I'm glad I could help you.
I'm glad to see you again.
I'm going out for a while.
I'm going to be out today.

Chinese: 如果你開心，我也就開心。

English: I'm happy to see you here.
Chinese: 我很高興在這裡看到你。

English: I'm not very good at golf.
Chinese: 我不太擅长打高尔夫球。

English: I'm only here for one day.
I'm ready to go back home.
I'm sorry that I hurt you.
I'm sure they can hear us.
Chinese: 我確定他們能聽到我們說的話。

English: I'm very happy to see you.
I've done a lot this week.
If you heat ice, it melts.
Chinese: 如果你加热冰它就会融化。

English: Is Tom going to dump Mary?
Is death the only way out?
Is it still far from here?
Is it true Tom can't swim?
Is this a pen or a pencil?
Chinese: 这是一只钢笔还是铅笔？

English: It can be used as a knife.
Chinese: 它可以被當成一把刀來用。

English: It is by no means certain.
It is good to be a winner.
It is wrong to tell a lie.
It isn't too late for you.
It may or may not be true.
Chinese: 這可能是真的，也可能不是。

English: It snowed a lot last year.
It was my duty to do that.
It was the only way to go.
It's a nice day, isn't it?
It's easy to catch a cold.
It's not going to be long.
It's time to hit the sack.
Let me think for a minute.
